string.name: whats_new_text
string.translation_description: Description of new features in this version in html

resources.string:
New in version %s

\t • Using the gyro is now the default for phones that support it
\t • Bugfix for the time travel dates (whoops - thanks to the many users who reported the bug)
\t • Fixed German translations (thanks: JohannesWestphal)
\t • Terms of service now in Korean (thanks: Doi W)
